description:
This course explores an aspect of American literature intensively; specific course topics will vary, and have included "American Authors and the Imagined Past" and "American Gothic." 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TOPICS AMERICAN LIT: American War & Travel Literature:  Vietnam
